sentence.Network_en: The physicians at first laughed at the unknown wayfarer.
sentence.Network_cn: 医生们起先嘲笑这个来历不明的旅行者.

sentence.Network_en: Thou art the solitary wayfarer in this deserted street.
sentence.Network_cn: 在这冷寂的街上,你是孤独的行人.

sentence.Network_en: It was difficult to encounter a wayfarer of more wretched appearance.
sentence.Network_cn: 要碰见一个比他更褴褛的过路人是很不容易的了.
